website_summaries.verdict: This model is not the top of the market, but provides a reliable small LCD TV at a respectable price.
pros: Perfect size for a bedroom, office, or small study
cons: This model is not a smart-TV
Only includes one HDMI port for hooking up auxiliary devices

customer_reviews.title: so I guess everything is fine.
customer_reviews.text: This TV was for my wife's sewing room. After I set it up and got it to running I was let go. There have been no screams for me to return, so I guess everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Moore

customer_reviews.title: Sound is just fine.  Picture is excellent.  Glad to be have found a small enough TV of high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Picture: As sharp and clear as you're going to get with an LED 1080p TV, which is excellent. Sound: I'm 64 and actually have diminished hearing in my right ear. We have this TV in a 10' X 14' kitchen. The sound at less than half volume is absolutely fine throughout the room. Raising the volume to max makes it uncomfortably loud. Those who have complained about the sound need to see an Ear, Nose, and Throat doc ASAP. (This TV gets its signal from a cable connection.)
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice little television for the kitchen. Many reviews mention disappointment in the speakers/sound quality. I find that the sound is satisfactory in my kitchen. This tv has no provision for auxiliary speakers and has only one HDMI and one coax input. But then again, I didn't buy this to be part of a entertainment center, I bought it to glance at the news while cooking dinner.
customer_reviews.author: bassguitarman

customer_reviews.title: This TV is a great size for a bedroom or kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The sellers promptly answered a question I asked regarding this TV's dimesions, and it arrived exactly on time. This TV is a great size for a bedroom or kitchen. It was easy to set up and has a great picture. We're very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: picture is sharp and sound is good for this size TV
customer_reviews.text: Overall, picture is sharp and sound is good for this size TV. It fits nicely on the kitchen counter where we needed a small TV.
customer_reviews.author: Lyman K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Our Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have good luck with LG products in the past, so we bought this set from Amazon. It has a great picture and decent sound. The setup instructions were poor and confusing. Our cable company tech solved the minor issue which involved seeing the picture. It's all good now.
customer_reviews.author: nutriaguy

customer_reviews.title: 1080 in a 22inch.  about time
customer_reviews.text: great fit in the semi. now good stuff. hard to find a 1080 in a smaller screen. display is outstanding and the great lg quality. no tools needed to put stand on and also very sturdy. sound was week at intial settings but greatly improved after two different settings. very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: PAPA DON

customer_reviews.title: GEART COUNTER TOP TV BARGAIN
customer_reviews.text: WOW...for a small counter top type TV the picture is excellent (1080i). And for the reviewers who said the sound is deficient I have one thing to say.....get your ears examined. While the sound is not concert hall quality it is crisp and not at all muffled or garbled unlike some other small TV's I have experienced. Set up was easy following the on screen instructions and a simple call to my cable company "synced" the TV to my cable box and viola, up and running in less that 10 minutes. You will not be disappointed if you purchase this TV.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: This one was a lemon!
customer_reviews.text: Even with the assistance of LG customer support the TV would not function. Since this occurred upon receipt of the item I opted to return it to Amazon rather than to have it repaired. Amazon rep was excellent with their response. I received a return label from Amazon and credit to my acct. almost immediately. A lot of time wasted waiting for an item that wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: P. trainor

customer_reviews.title: I had better luck with the cheapie brands!
customer_reviews.text: 3 months and now the only way I can watch cable provided TV is through the coax - which has a lower quality picture that via the HDMI port. The HDMI port no longer works. I determined it needs a new main board. This reason alone I will probably never buy a LG TV again. I have 2 other similar size cheap brand TV's that are still working perfect after 4-5 years. I'm sure I can buy a board for 35 bucks, but what an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Oegla

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV at a Bargain Price
customer_reviews.text: This 28" LG is an exceptional smaller-sized LED flat screen TV. It has a remarkably sharp picture with very natural color and many options for customizing the picture and sound. It's a good choice for placing in an entertainment center in a small room, which is how we're using ours. The only drawback I've found is that this particular model has only one HDMI port for connecting accessories. I had to buy an HDMI adapter unit with additional ports in order to hook-up both the HD TV cable and a DVD/Blu-Ray player. Other than that, the TV is great and was a real bargain for the $179.00 asking price.
customer_reviews.author: araybe

customer_reviews.title: Customer service from LG has been terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to set up the TV aspect using the directions, as well as my expertise setting up TVs for many years. I have tried to gt in touch with LG and they tell you to use FaceBook and twitter. They don't respond. As you can see from the picture the TV doesn't work. I will have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldwasser

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Sounds good. Easy to use easy to setup. Works with cable or your gaming devise such as Nintendo switch or Xbox one & so on Very happy customer 😌
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Santiago

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We bought multiples of these to replace outdated TV's in the mid-sized rooms of our Cape Cod B&B. We chose them on the strength of positive reviews on Amazon. So far there have been no comments whatsoever from our guests about these units, which indicates to us that they are doing their job as intended. Had the opposite been true there would have been complaints and critical comments. So we're satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cambridge Living

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Tv is blurry on HD channels, returned for another one but same thing. They told me it was my cable box , which is brand new. I tried another tv I have and no issue. Very disappointed and would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Falco

customer_reviews.title: sound did not work on new TV
customer_reviews.text: Brand new TV out of the box. Needed a smaller set for small space in bathroom. I wasted two hours trying to get sound to work. It would not work with several cable boxes and two new HDMI cables. The settings including audio output setting to speakers were correctly configured. I called LG service and they decided it was defective. I returned it through Amazon as they have great service. LG would have taken a month. This should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: customvue

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Samsung TVs, but decided to try LG because of price. I am TOTALLY SATISFIED with the LG TV AND the technical support from LG. I wasn't completely sure how to adjust a couple of the features on the TV. I called the 800 number for technical support and was connected to someone who was VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE who walked me through the procedures to do EXACTLY what I needed to do to make the adjustments I needed on my TV. The picture, sound, and quality of this TV is EXCELLENT.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little tv
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tv for small spaces, such as my tiny camper. The picture quality is typical LG...excellent. More impressive is the sound quality for such a small tv. There’s enough hookups for most things, but no Bluetooth. This is a great option for anyone looking for a small tv.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: The 720p is noticeable as compared to a 1080p (replaced a 1080p that developed HDMI problems). Sound quality is OK but what is disappointing is that there is no "audio out" or headphone jack. Will keep this TV to use in the basement but will be looking for a better option for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: C. Callaway

customer_reviews.title: It was like that out of the box and I just don’t ...
customer_reviews.text: HDMI connection is sketchy. I have to wiggle the cable to make it work. It was like that out of the box and I just don’t feel like going through the hassle of returning it. Good picture. Sounds very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great and the size is perfect for my study. Very nice TV so far. I hope it last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Douris

customer_reviews.title: best.monitor.ever.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I just love this darn thing. I use it for TV as well as gaming. That moment when Windows tells you the recommended resolution is 1920x1080 brings a warm fuzzy little feeling. Not that everything I watch/play takes full advantage of it, but it's there when you need it, the colors pop, and it's clear as hell. Also, there are way more settings available than on my older Phillips, not to mention the remote on that old thing only worked half the time. This remote makes it easy to change a/v settings between cinema or gaming mode, and it even has Auto Volume and Clear Voice settings under audio settings.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Sound is Poor
customer_reviews.text: Sound is really tinny and the volume is limited. Don’t buy if you have any kind of hearing loss.
customer_reviews.author: prairiedoggy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine until today, with the exception of speakers that weren’t great. Today I went to turn it on, and the bottom right corner has lines and it doesn’t display. It looks as though the screen has separated a bit from the housing. Too late to process a return, but we have had it less than three months.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Yandell-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Barebones TV
customer_reviews.text: The LG Electronics 24LJ4540 is a basic TV and maybe that's about all that can be expected for under $100. Has an antenna input, HDMI input, and power in. That's all the connections. No audio out so no sound bar can be used. Fortunately, even with the small built in speakers, sound quality is actually pretty good. No USB although manual indicates that limited USB is available on the 28" model. Picture is great and tuner does its job just fine. HDMI works well with a PC as a monitor and should be good for a dvd player although I have not tried that.
customer_reviews.author: Meckanism

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have any dislikes. We were looking for a small TV for our kitchen. We wanted to place the TV on the counter and be able to see the screen from various locations in the kitchen and breakfast area. This product met every need. We are very impressed with the picture quality, brightness feature, and sound quality. This is our first purchase of an LG brand, and we are very pleased with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: Needed an inexpensive monitor for a beer app I use in my home bar. This plus a fire stick did the trick. Displays my data nicely. Nice small tv for those extra places.....
customer_reviews.author: Gene D

customer_reviews.title: Amazon said best choice for smart tv when it is not a smart tv.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer mistake, I thought I was buying a small smart tv because the tab on top said amazons choice for 24 inch smart tv. I should have looked closer and it’s my mistake but I’m giving 3 stars for amazons lack of clarity not the product. I was specifically looking for a smart tv and even had that in the search bar and this one seemed like it was just what I was looking for. Again it’s my mistake but I am a little upset the amazon tag said best choice for smart tv and with smart tv being in the search bar.
customer_reviews.author: cool game nice graphics

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small television with no frills
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this as a kitchen TV. The size is great -- I don't see how it could be smaller given the screen dimensions. It has a thin bezel, more than acceptable picture and sound quality and an excellent remote (meaning that it's simple, ergonomic, and logical with no idiotic "innovations"--- looking at you Samsung). It does *not* have wifi or an ethernet port, it does not have Netflix or Youtube. It is not a smart TV. If you want that, you need to look elsewhere. At least one reviewer commented on the TV's highly annoying voice menus. You can turn this off during setup and then you never hear it again.
customer_reviews.author: R. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and a sleek look overall at a good price, perfect fit for our tiny kitchen bar. No way around the downside: audio. LG wizards must have a good reason but the rest of us are beyond being puzzled. Why or why wouldn’t they include a simple audio output jack. At least this would let buyers have the option of connecting to a larger sound system with good speakers. Some folks may be satisfied with the set’s audio but certainly not everyone.
customer_reviews.author: HookC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our kitchen countertop
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new tv that had an HDMI connector for our kitchen and I found this model after a bit of searching. The picture and sound are great and it doesn't take up too much space. The only problem we had is that placing this on a countertop made the screen a bit harder to look at so I installed a couple of rubber pads on the front edge of the base so it tilted the screen a bit and now everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Wolfarth

customer_reviews.title: Great small tv with one Con.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, Good sound, easy set up. Yes it only has one HDMI and thats all I needed to hook up to a DVD., and no it doesnt tilt and for this size and price you shouldnt expect it to. Cons. The aspect ratio (picture size) options are limited, not having all the options of most other TVs and LGs. It has a few different modes that they dont fill the screen except for the Zoom mode that fills in a little too much, what its missing is a Full screen mode. The 16:1 mode does not fill in the entire screen. For the price and picture quality and me only using it for DVD it is a good tv.
customer_reviews.author: fire105

customer_reviews.title: Cable easily disconnected from tv
customer_reviews.text: The LG television had fantastic sound and display quality. Unfortunately, the power cord that goes in the back of the tv would not remain connected. Normally you have a ‘click’ when using HDMI cords or power cables, but with this model, the port would meet resistance and fall out if moved at all. This may be a manufacturing error that has not affected other people, but I sadly am having to send mine back because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great little RV tv.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our RV. Weighs only six and a half pounds. Put it on a wall mount. There are newer models for the same price but weigh twice as much. So went with lighter. Great picture. Sound is pretty decent and does get loud enough. Contrary to the many complaints registered here. Remember this is a little tv, not your big screen. So sound is just fine. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ben roy

customer_reviews.title: Works off a 12V battery in a boat or RV with a DC/DC 12V to 19V boost converter
customer_reviews.text: I'm putting this in my boat for both TV and a computer display (1920x1080p). This seems to be a good alternative to the 12V TVs that are currently available. The trick is to add a Aweking Waterproof DC/DC 12V Step Up to 19V 4A 76W Voltage Boost Converter Regulator (tv seems to draw only about an amp, so 4A is an overkill). Time will tell if it will hold up to vibration and moisture. The display is not the brightest but considering the low power consumption I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F

customer_reviews.title: Good picture & sound -- wish the remote did more
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the picture and sound (not quite concert-quality, but good for the shows I like to watch). But as with some other TV remotes, this one has plenty of buttons, and in fact, this one is supposed to be able to control certain types of other devices -- but I haven't found any way to teach it how to control my DirecTV box, which means I need 2 remotes to watch TV -- one for the TV, and one for the satellite box. Inconvenient. Since all the buttons are there, why can't it control both??
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Works great in a small RV! Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small popup camper...mounted on a cheap adjustable monitor arm. I converted this 19v TV to 12v with a $10 buck converted and it works great. It doesn't even draw an amp, so it's great on the batteries as well. They sound certainly isn't hifi, but for my camper I can't complain. It gets loud enough and it's clear...that is what matters. The picture is just fine for a small TV as well. I'm somewhat of an audio\videophile and it's a far cry from the 85" in my living room, but if you compare this to a typical TV you are a dingus.
customer_reviews.author: Beantown

customer_reviews.title: Great DC TV
customer_reviews.text: This runs on 19v, just like my Shield Android TV. Shield is currently only input, an HDMI switch may be in store for a future purchase. To get 19v I used a simple 4a boost converter. TV and Shield combined use about 2a. I would have liked a bigger screen, but 22" 1080p isn't bad at all. Sound quality is also good. As others have noted the USB and 1/8" ports do not function for power or audio. I suggest using an Android or Fire TV for Bluetooth audio. I switch to a JBL Charge 4 for audio output when I need to take my sound outside.
customer_reviews.author: Dross

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and the picture was grainy with intermittent static bars across the screen. So I returned it and they sent me another. Seemed fine. I have just turned it on the poor picture quality is back. I am very disappointed. Unfortunately this TV is in a second home, so some time passed before I noticed the issue and i can no longer return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: (1) There is no power available from the single USB port. (2) The power cord with AC adapter is too short; I had to buy another cable and adapter when wall mounting the TV. (3) So, If you want an active antenna and a Roku stick, you will have to provide a total of 3 power sources. How simple it would have been to include 2 USB ports with power! The picture is okay and the sound isn't bad for a small TV. ...however, if you want to do anything else with it other than hook it up to a cable (eg Comcast), forget it ; it's a headache
customer_reviews.author: avocet

customer_reviews.title: picture clarity
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my old Sony 19" (10 yrs old) with this 24" LG. I work in a small area, and primarily watch movies on my tv as I work. (I'm a decorative painter) Set up was a snap, and with a few adjustments, the picture is beautiful! Sound is great, but there is no need to crank it up due to my small working area (7' x 8') Overall, this is a great all around tv, and would most likely also work well in anyone's kitchen or bedroom. So far, so good...I'll write back at a future date on this tvs' performance.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great small 1080p tv/ monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small full hd tv for my office and this fits the bill. It is really hard to find 1080p tv and smart tv so i opt in for this tv which is 1080p full hd but not smart so i ended up buying a amazon fire tv and everything works great!
customer_reviews.author: REDFOXXX

customer_reviews.title: Not a great picture
customer_reviews.text: Somehow despite the high resolution, the picture seemed somehow distorted, sort of "pulled". Just didn't look great. I opened, connected, looked, re-boxed, and returned. No further info.
customer_reviews.author: BJORN BUNNELL

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a TV to go in my kitchen. I had an off brand that was awful. This 24" LQ is great. This picture is perfect with a screen size that fits the space. I was not happy when the price dropped $10 the day after I ordered it, but truly it is worth the $99.99 to me. It was super easy to pickup my Dish Network channels.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I think that Amazon should be more detailed about how an HDTV works out
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is a great TV, but I prefer my TVs to be able to connect with outside speakers, so when I called the company that manufactured this product, they told me that the 3.5mm link only had input capability than output capability, and so I immediately exchanged this TV for another with output capability. My advice, is to look over the TV's statistics carefully, if you want an HDTV that fits your preferences, like output speaker capability. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: John Alexander Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT T.V. FOR KITCHEN, GARAGE OR CAMPER
customer_reviews.text: I READ ALL THE REVIEWS ON THIS LG BEFORE I PURCHASED IT. IF YOUR GETTING THIS T.V. FOR YOUR GARAGE, KITCHEN, OR CAMPER YOU WILL BE PLEASANTLY SURPRISED. I BOUGHT MINE FOR MY GARAGE AND LOVE IT. I WOULD HAVE GAVE THIS TELEVISION A 5 STAR RATING EXCEPT FOR THE SOUND QUALITY. LIKE THE REVIEWS STATE THE SOUND IS A LITTLE ON THE LOW SIDE. I ADJUSTED MINE TO STEREO AND IT HELPS, BUT I STILL HAVE IT TURNED UP TO 95. OTHER THAN THAT, IT'S A SHARP LITTLE TELEVISION.
customer_reviews.author: robert crist

customer_reviews.title: Great TV at Bargain Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture and sound for an inexpensive bedroom TV. Although rated at 720 dpi, at this size screen a higher resolution is not necessary. Easy to set up because the set programs itself with all tv channels available through a cable provider or over the air broadcast. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Chappa

customer_reviews.title: Great small Television!
customer_reviews.text: This small television is perfect for my gaming nook. It has all of the bells and whistles of a larger television but at a reasonable price. I normally shop Newegg for my tech but this was a great find! Would highly recommend. Registration for the product was a breeze too.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Badger

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old. I just wanted a small tv for his room so he could watch DVDs. It was easy to put together and looks nice, but I literally couldn't connect his DVD player (which is also made by LG). Who doesn't make audio/video connections for one but does for the other. I'm going to see how I can send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: this tv has excellent operating features. Great sound and picture quality. I would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann Fast

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Good picture despite 720p resolution. - Attractive price for LG quality. - VERY easy to set up. - Broad range of customizations available in the "Settings" dialogs. - Light weight. Cons: - Woefully inadequate I/O options. No RGB input, USB port is only for service techs, no audio output. - Poor sound quality from downward-firing speakers. - Screen may be too small for anything but a small room. Bottom line, the set's adequate for our needs (an alcove off the family room) but not much more. For something like a bedroom or rec area, bite the bullet and pay for a larger screen and more connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Karpinski

customer_reviews.title: Very dark picture with default settings.
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned this TV because the picture was so dark. I kept trying to change settings like brightness etc. Nothing helped until I found a setting called Vivid. That brightened up the picture. My son who knows a lot about TV's said I should not have to use the vivid setting, but he could not get a bright enough picture with any other setting either. There is no real manual that comes with this TV. You just have to fumble around and figure out everything yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Carol LeGray

customer_reviews.title: Good little screen
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my Mom's room and she loved it! The sounds is actually quite good considering it's built into a small screen. Picture quality is good, but nothing high end. Very impressed for the price and size of this! LG products are always solid.
customer_reviews.author: RyanD3191

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a replacement for a small TV to use in my office while I work. I wanted a TV with a higher resolution but they're just not out there. I tried this and happy with it. The color is good - doesn't look natural. Resolution is actually fine for me. There is a slow response to turn on - that's my only complaint.I do't use the smart features. I have it plugged into my cable box and use the cable remote.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Krauss

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value, Less than Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This TV is a great value and I was happy to have found it in a not normally standard size of 24 inches, which was just what I needed. The picture is really nice for set this size. My only complaint is that the sound quality is pretty brash and tinny. I've tried the various sound pre-sets that are available in the menu and have settled on one that is not really too bad. All and all, I'm happy with the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my Camper.
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is great and the sound is better than I expected. It is easy to set up when I set up my camper and get cable and power hooked up. It's just the right size and has a secure standing base. It can also be mounted if you like on a swing arm. I will make a travel case for it so that it doesn't get bounced around to much in the trailer. When at home I just plug it in my drafting room to keep up with the news. Good buy for the money and delivered quickly by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent picture channel to channel - Problem Fixed!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I rated this very low (see problem below). But once I updated my cable box it works perfectly. Original rating: The picture size changes from channel to channel. ESPN has black space above & below with long skinny picture. CBS fills screen but part of CBS logo is cut off - how much more of the picture am I missing? Very disturbing watching channel to channel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette S Cates, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Really great picture even if it is a no-frills TV.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just perfect with a XBox 360. It has no headphone jack and one HDMI input which is limiting, but I bought an external HDMI switchbox and optical-to-headphone-jack adapter to make up for it. The picture is full HD (1920x1080) with bright, vivid colors, good black levels, and a lot of adjustments you can make to the picture. The speakers are OK, not great, but for a small TV they are decent. I like this TV a lot! I miss the old ones that had a surplus of analog inputs, but this one is great to use with more modern videogame systems.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the kitchen counter. Volume is not loud enough to hear well when I am making ordinary kitchen noises - and the sound does not sync with the family room even though they operate off the same Comcast cable box. I did not have this issue wth my other tv which was sadly ruined due to a storm.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Good for money - beware of wall mounting.
customer_reviews.text: Good tv for the money. Volume could be higher but sound is ok. Issue is the inputs how the manf decided to put the power plug dead center and the hdmi off center straight out baffles me. They have two other “service” connection side inputs. Clearly it should be the other way around. Depending on what tv wall or ceiling mount you get most mount dead center and the power plug is in the way or you can’t mount. Also the cords come out toward the wall vs off the side. Stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Product good, but product registration collects consumer information to sell
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars except for the registration process which is nothing short of collecting information for them to provide (sell?) to other companies. The Opt Out option is a joke since it won't allow you to opt out of all companies listed, which in turn have subsidiaries that get all of your contact information. The product itself seems like just what I wanted for my sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: Grandcalia

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: In search of a relatively small TV for my bedroom, I exhaustively researched the available options and after reading mostly positive reviews, chose this LG model. It arrived today--I was so excited to start watching. Unfortunately, it's just awful: the sound is tinny and terrible, the picture is grainy and a bit out of focus. I'm so unhappy and I want to prevent someone else from making the same mistake. Don't buy this model!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Harmonay

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture, but disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: The picture is nice -- certainly no complaints there. But the volume is really low. Bummer also that there is only a single HDMI port. And the clincher -- the thing that means the search continues -- is that there is no tilt adjustment. I really like LG, both large screen tvs and major household appliances. But that just makes this all the more disappointing. They should know better.
customer_reviews.author: just another geek

customer_reviews.title: Small but a great.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality and excellent picture resolution. Easily adjusted. We keep it on kitchen counter. It is easy to turn the TV to to face in other directions; it can face the ironing board or the dining table and living room. We needed a small TV --we purchased the 22 inch.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Ghost tv
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a 2nd computer monitor. Picture was fine for what I needed, but TV kept turning off and on by itself! I did all the troubleshooting I could and nothing worked. I did a little more research and found out that this is a common thing with LG brand televisions. I found so many videos and articles saying so from years back, it was hard to believe that LG hadn't addressed this issue by now. What a shame from such a big brand. Before you buy an LG television, please lookup articles on this matter and you will see how common it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HDMI port didn't even last two months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this small TV for gaming, but the HDMI port burned out in a little over one month. It would display for about 5 minutes and then the TV shuts down. The red light would blink constantly. It fixes itself if you just let it be for an hour or so, but the problem would repeat itself. I did try different HDMI plugs, and that fixed nothing. Shutting it off and letting it stay off for 10 minutes didn't fix anything either.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: sound lacking
customer_reviews.text: Has I great picture, but sound is really lacking. I purchased this for my RV when the overhead air conditioner kicks on you can not hear it at 100% volume. it has no connections for external speaker or amp. if you buy this for a bedroom it probably be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not 1080p, poor speakers
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 24” 1080p tv to replace my Scepter tv which got dropped and the screen got cracked. When I got the tv it showed it was 720p. The picture quality is just not as good. Also, the speakers are not good quality. In order to hear it fro 6 feet away I have to crank up the volume to 80 of 100 where my Scepter only needed to be at 30 of 100. I feel it was not worth the $106 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: SailingFool

customer_reviews.title: Stand wrong angle and not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Stand wrong angle and not adjustable. HDMI port intermittent. I returned for credit and got a much better HP monitor with sound, adjustable stand, and good HDMI input for less. I really didn’t need the tuner so the negatives overwhelmed that.
customer_reviews.author: michael vendrell

customer_reviews.title: Love this Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this 22” for my husband’s lutherie school! We just mounted it, stuck a FIRE STICK in it and bam! Now students can watch YouTube videos, loook at pictures, or listen to Prime Music and more! Easy to set up, amazing picture! I wish it had a Bluetooth or /and USB port(s). But you get the HDMI for the Fire Stick and your set. Sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tv for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to replace old tv. Sound is good for small kitchen dinning room area. Mounted easily and on existing under counter mount. Easy to install, and for 77 year old that is important. My wife love's it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Strain

customer_reviews.title: Superior picture, compact footing, and excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Large, extremely clear picture; Sound is clear and loud (I had to turn in way down.). Cons: To connect to a DVD player or anything else, you will need a splitter and a RCA ( red, white, yellow plug) cable to a USB connection. This will cost about $40. Never go cheap on cables you'll buy new ones next year. I've had gold cables I bought 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk J. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this TV. The picture colors and brightness, viewable from angles. The sound is not tinny. So what's not to love. I have it mounted up on a wall in the kitchen and it's perfect. Only the second item from LG and I am impressed. I will be keeping LG in mind should I be in need of other devises they produce. But lets see how long it lasts. The two previous to this TV only lasted a little over 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Jerseygirl

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my kids for Christmas, open the boxes to set them up, one is nothing but the TV. No plug in, remote, nothing but the tv!! So I have no idea if the damn thing works or not. Thanks for ruining my girls Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Easy to set up and just TV. didn't want or need any extras. Just a TV to watch or listen to while I cook dinner. I read the sound was bad on some of them, but we have it on 15 and that is plenty loud enough for us.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I guess we got what we paid for
customer_reviews.text: Tv sound doesn't work, but can't return because we threw the box out. Didn't expect to have issues with it since we've ordered plenty of things, from Amazon, without issues.
customer_reviews.author: DeeJayEss

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for a steering wheel set-up o. GTsport
customer_reviews.text: It hass low bass so dont expect tremble or nothing but sound quality is ok picture is better than i expect ected actually. I use it for GT Sport. And its amazing even on this TV. Great price and overall TV. Downside is 1 HDMI and the backlight or brightness. Sometimes it looks too dark or dim.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It does not work
customer_reviews.text: I am super upset. I just noticed this TV stopped working today on 9-8-18 and it says the return policy expired 9-1. Amazon honored it and exchanged the TV. Super happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Availability, Price  and Customer care. My first  go to for most  anything you need.
customer_reviews.text: First order TV HDMI port dead . No signal. Immediately called LG support for help . Test procedure proved defective unit . Replacement recommended. Call Amazon support another unit order placed at no charge. The unit delivered the very next day. Amazon is awesome the customer care is exceptional. The new LG replacement is perfect and everything works great. Picture, sound and operation is excellent . So far so good. This unit is just the right size for kitchen or small to average size room. Note set up and all adjustments are very easy . I give this experience and overall rating 5 out of 5 Gold stars.
customer_reviews.author: jel011

customer_reviews.title: Needs better audio
customer_reviews.text: The TV works for the purpose it was purchased. A small TV to be used in the kitchen. The only lacking element is the audio is not loud enough. The kitchen isn't that large that this shouldn't work, however it does require to be at the highest level just to be heard a few feet away. The picture quality is excellent. Setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrh

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup; I had dreaded learning a new appliance but it was super easy and fast. The picture etc is so superior to previous set, I'm estatic. Now I don't have to tweak the antena when I change channels, what a relief. It's brand new; if my opinion changes I'll post it but I think this is excellent We're easy breezy with no cable or other attachments; the simple life.
customer_reviews.author: jlsh

customer_reviews.title: Good color and it works well with Fios  Most didn’t
customer_reviews.text: Have this new tv. When power goes out. Have to reprogram Picture colors etc Otherwise. Great tv We use this one outside on our kitchen deck. Covers in a wooden box with slate roof and a removable plastic cover. Great color and picture
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for my 6 year olds bedroom. It fits perfectly on her dresser. We've had it for 7 months & so far no problems. The picture looks great & she has no problem using the remote. At first I was sceptical about buying a TV online, but I buy plenty of other products on Amazon & haven't had any packaging issues. So, I went with my gut & bought it. It arrived on time, no damage to the packaging & the product was in perfect condition! Great little TV & great price! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Valkyrie

customer_reviews.title: Good little unit
customer_reviews.text: Our old TV was not capable of working with our cable tv new boxes, too much buffering and digitalizing the image. Switched to this small tv (fits under kitchen cabinet) and all the problems disappeared. I had to quit blaming Xfinity, it was my tv and not their service.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Fanastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 24 inch for my bedroom to replace a huge old clunker of a tv. This is perfect, picture quality and sound is great.

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're buying do you research
customer_reviews.text: Bought tv for my mom it has been a nightmare The minute we received it. It keeps going off Sound works when it wants to. Sometime won't come on at all. Just a bad experience buyer be ware when ordering this model and the company charges you to send it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good TV, Low Audio Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a great small TV, but it has lousy sound quality. If you are watching a movie you'll need to turn the sound all the way up to 100. For regular TV 60 is about right. I think I'll need a separate speaker for this TV. Picture quality and everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: TKOP40

customer_reviews.title: Lacks connectability.
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the lack of connectability options to other devices such as my audio system. Also manual is very basic and offers very little useful user information.
customer_reviews.author: anotherguy

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv for a home office.
customer_reviews.text: I have this tv in my home office. I did not want nor need a smart tv. This one is perfect for my need. The volume is kept low so I can’t say if it has a great output. The picture is better then the Samsung tv that it replaced. I have only had it for a few weeks, but I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: johio

customer_reviews.title: Okay if you know what you're getting into.  I didn't.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is okay -- nothing special. My biggest problem with it is that there are only two ways to hook it up -- HDMI or cable. Since the point was to hook it up to a DVD player in my office, I had to look for awhile to find one I could actually hook up to the TV. Another problem with it is that the power cord is way too short. If you want your TV sitting on the floor next to the electrical outlet, this is the TV for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV for My Wife's Sewing Room
customer_reviews.text: I decided that my wife needed to replace the old-fashioned, tube-type TV in her sewing room. So, I ordered the LG for Christmas. Why the LG? It has the best picture of the TV's in my "man cave", and the price was right on Amazon. I was a bit afraid to order a TV online, but it arrived in perfect condition. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J. McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Good picture. Good sound. Only HDMI.
customer_reviews.text: Works right of the box. Good picture. I know some people have qualms about the sound quality in these little sets, but the sound for this one is just fine. It only has a single HDMI input. No analog inputs, no component. So it's perfect in a kitchen or child's bedroom as long as you have a high-def cable box with HDMI. If you have Verizon fios, the fios remote programs easily to control this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: A great display monitor
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this TV is its cheap price. I have compared a lot of various TV sets. This TV supports 1080P picture quality, is compact, and has its own speakers. I used this TV for my switch console to display the screen. The picture quality is good, it’s perfect for gaming. Although is a really small monitor, the price is not pricey too. So I would likely to recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: pie

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitors for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great monitors for the money, I would buy again. I bought three for my garage setup. Only thing I don’t like is the power plug and brick. I wish they used the universal power cable for monitors or bricks that were similar to laptop chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a small TV in the bedroom of our RV. It fits perfectly and works beautifully. I can now take my Direct TV receiver from home, put in the RV and enjoy wherever we may be. My wife is a very happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth, Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: LG Electronics 22LJ4540 22-Inch 1080p IPS LED TV (2017 Model)
customer_reviews.text: I impressed with this LG television and customer service. The LG is television calming and the channels allows for you to choose sub channels, as well. For instance, hand press channel 5 and you'll see 5.1, 5.2, 5.3 and you can do the selecting. The picture quality is dynamic! Great recommendation! Blessings.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted...

I am very happy that it is such a nice unit all the way around for a very low price of only $116. Picture quality, sound and color are all very good and realistic. Very easy to use for low-tech folks like me. Happy!

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I really like this TV. Easy to assemble and set up and picture quality is good. Just what I needed for my kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: This TV is great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is thrilled with this TV! First, it fits in his office space where he had a 12" ac/dc tv that was very, very old! He said that the picture is bright and clear and he can hear this one! So hes' happy, therefore, I am too!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Upton

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected for a bedroom tv
customer_reviews.text: Our bedroom tv has a connection to basic cable (but not the regular boxes that receive HBO, etc.) This replaced an old CRT style Panasonic that was not HD. The new picture is fabulous and the sound is good for the size and place. I've been a fan of LG tvs and monitors for a number of years and they rarely disappoint!
